Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that represents the server. It will establish a connection and communicate with the server.

      • createGame

        public void createGame(java.lang.String nsid,
                       java.lang.String hash,
                       int numOfPlayers,
                       int timeout,
                       java.lang.String gameType)
        A function that creates a connection with the server and creates a game as well as instantiates aModel, iModel, aView, aController, game-id and token.
        Parameters:
        nsid - A valid U of S NSID.
        hash - A valid hash associated with the NSID.
        numOfPlayers - he number of player in the game selected by the user.
        timeout - The time for the timeout for one move selected by the user.
        gameType - The game type selected by the user.

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(java.lang.String nsid,
                     java.lang.String hash,
                     int gameId,
                     java.lang.String token)
        A function that creates a connection with the server and joins a game as well as instantiates aModel, iModel, aView, aController, game-id and token.
        Parameters:
        nsid - A valid U of S NSID.
        hash - A valid hash associated with the NSID.
        token - A secret token provided by the server to the game host.
        gameId - The gameID provided by the server to the host.

      • attemptToCreate

        public void attemptToCreate(Server.CreateGameEvent cge)
        A function that attempts to create a game by sending create game data to the server.
        Parameters:
        cge - A valid createGameEvent that contains data about the new game.

      • attemptToJoin

        public void attemptToJoin(Server.JoinGameEvent jge)
        A function that attempts to create a game by sending join game data to the server.
        Parameters:
        jge - A valid joinGameEvent containing info about the join game command.
